LanguageData.CookBRGohan.label: Cook Brown Rice Gohan
LanguageData.CookBRGohan.description: Take raw rice-kome-and cook it to make Gohan.
LanguageData.CookBRGohan4.label: Cook Brown Rice Gohan x4
LanguageData.CookBRGohan4.description: Take raw rice-kome-and cook it to make Gohan.
LanguageData.CookGohan.label: Cook White Rice Gohan
LanguageData.CookGohan.description: Make Gohan, a staple food and term for "meal." When paired with Asa, Hiru, and Ban it can mean breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
LanguageData.CookGohan4.label: Cook White Rice Gohan x4
LanguageData.CookGohan4.description: Make Gohan, a staple food and term for "meal." When paired with Asa, Hiru, and Ban it can mean breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
LanguageData.CookBROnigiri4.label: Cook Brown Rice Onigiri x4
LanguageData.CookBROnigiri4.description: A simple ball of rice seasoned with salt: perfect for eating on the go.
